title: My New Husband Told His Friends I’m Not Attractive
description:
Today we hear from a man wondering what boundaries will protect his commitment with his girlfriend to wait for sex until marriage, a woman hesitant to tell her curious son the specifics of her dad’s horrific suicide, and a new wife shocked and hurt after overhearing her husband tell friends he doesn’t find her attractive.
Lyrics of the Day: "In My Room" - The Beach Boys
Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
 Support Our Sponsors:
